faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: We're available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST. Need immediate assistance? Type 'contact' to reach our team!

faqs.question: What are your prices?
faqs.answer: Our pricing varies based on your needs. I'd love to connect you with our team for a custom quote. Type 'contact' or provide your email and we'll reach out!

faqs.question: What is your shipping policy?
faqs.answer: We offer free shipping on orders over $50 within the US. International shipping is available - rates calculated at checkout.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund - no questions asked!

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.
